resources.string:
1) App price is 500
2) On earning activity and upon your referalls you would get coins which would be converted into rupees.
3. The price of coin would change on the basis of changing of the rate of dollar.
4. The company can change its policies whenever it wants you would have no argument upon it
5. You got 200 by making your direct refferal.
6. On second level you would get 20 and on third or fourth you would get 10 pkr.
7. Your collected coins will be converted on the rupees whene you claim them
8. The withdraw will be given to you in 3-7 working days
9. For doing any of the fraud your account would be block and your balance would be confiscated.
